title: github.com/StackExchange/wmi: test panics with "freelist empty"
body:
go version go1.3rc2 windows/amd64

With go 1.2.2 on Windows, running "go test" runs (and fails, due to a bug in a
package). Using the 1.3rc2 release, test panics with the trace pasted below. The go-ole
package in the trace extensively uses unsafe while making Windows syscalls and may be
the culprit.
